```{r}
db1 <- read.csv("Mateo_Zuluaga_1_7m_110m_87s.csv")
distancia <- 110
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
db1 <- db1 %>%
        mutate(fecha= as.POSIXct(timestamp/1000, origin = "1970-01-01"))
db1_1 <- db1 %>%
  mutate(tiempo = timestamp %/% 100) %>%
  group_by(tiempo) %>%
  summarise(AccX = mean(AccX, na.rm = TRUE),
            AccY = mean(AccY, na.rm = TRUE),
            AccZ = mean(AccZ, na.rm = TRUE))
db1_1 <- db1_1 %>%
            mutate(accT = sqrt(AccX ^ 2 + AccY ^ 2 + AccZ ^ 2))
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(db1_1, aes(tiempo, accT)) + geom_line()
```

```{r}
db1_1 <- db1_1 %>% filter(!is.na(accT))
spec2 <- spec.pgram(db1_1$accT, las = 1)
```

```{r}
maxFrec <- spec2$freq[which(spec2$spec == max(spec2$spec))]
maxFrec
```

```{r}
tiempoTotal_db1 <- db1$fecha[nrow(db1)] - db1$fecha[1]
as.vector(tiempoTotal_db1) * 600
```

```{r}
as.vector(tiempoTotal_db1) * 600 * maxFrec
```

```{r}
(longPaso2 <- distancia/(as.vector(tiempoTotal_db1) * 600 * maxFrec))
```
